src:
Murah Harganya, iPhone SE 2 Diprediksi Laku 20 Juta Unit
07 Nov 2019, 15:56 by Fino Yurio Kristo - detikInet


Ilustrasi. Foto: Internet

Jakarta - iPhone murah tentu banyak yang tergiur. Maka maklum saja jika iPhone SE 2 diperkirakan laris manis.Masih berupa gosip, rumor soal iPhone SE 2 telah cukup deras mengalir. Terutama dilontarkan oleh analis terpercaya soal gadget Apple, Ming Chi Kuo. Kuo telah membocorkan bahwa iPhone SE 2 bakal diluncurkan Apple pada paruh pertama 2020 dengan harga USD 399 atau Rp 5,6 juta. Jauh lebih murah dibandingkan iPhone 11, apalagi iPhone 11 Pro atau 11 Pro Max.Terbaru, dia memprediksi iPhone SE 2 akan terjual sampai 20 juta unit sepanjang tahun 2020. Jika benar, tentu akan menjadi lumbung uang yang tak sedikit bagi Apple."Karena harganya yang murah, konsumen akan menginginkannya dan pendapatan perusahaan bisa meningkat lagi. Saat rilis iPhone 11, harganya yang murah dibanding iPhone XS sebelumnya adalah salah satu faktor menarik bagi konsumen," tulis International Business Times.iPhone SE 2 kabarnya memakai System on a Chip atau SoC yang sama dengan iPhone 11 yang menjanjikan performanya bertenaga. Pola yang sama dulu dilakukan Apple di iPhone SE pertama, di mana jeroannya dibenamkan prosesor yang sama dengan iPhone 6.Kuo memprediksi iPhone SE 2 akan menarik bagi mereka yang masih menggunakan iPhone 6 dan 6S yang diestimasi masih dipakai 200 juta orang. "Pemakai seri iPhone 6 mungkin lebih merasa perlu mengganti ke model yang sudah diperbaharui karena iOS 13 tak lagi mendukungnya," tulis Kuo dalam catatan ke investor belum lama ini Simak Video "Inikah Calon Penggengam Pertama iPhone Terbaru di Asia Tenggara?"[Gambas:Video 20detik](fyk/rns)
text:
The price is cheap, the iPhone SE 2 is predicted to sell 20 million units
Nov 7 2019, 15:56 by Fino Yurio Kristo - detikInet


Illustration. Photo: Internet

Jakarta - Cheap iPhones certainly many are tempted. So just be advised if the iPhone SE 2 is expected to sell well. Still in the form of gossip, rumors about the iPhone SE 2 have been flowing pretty fast. Especially raised by a trusted analyst about Apple gadgets, Ming Chi Kuo. Kuo has leaked that Apple's iPhone SE 2 will be launched in the first half of 2020 at a price of USD 399 or Rp5.6 million. Much cheaper than the iPhone 11, let alone the iPhone 11 Pro or 11 Pro Max. Recently, he predicts the iPhone SE 2 will sell up to 20 million units throughout 2020. If true, of course it will be a barn of money that is not small for Apple. "Because the price cheap, consumers will want it and the company's revenue can increase again. When the release of the iPhone 11, the price is cheap compared to the previous iPhone XS is one of the attractive factors for consumers, "wrote the International Business Times. The iPhone SE 2 reportedly used System on a Chip or SoC the same as the iPhone 11 which promises powerful performance. The same pattern was used by Apple in the first iPhone SE, where the innards were embedded with the same processor as the iPhone 6.Kuo predicts the iPhone SE 2 will be attractive to those who still use the iPhone 6 and 6S, which are estimated to still be used by 200 million people. "Users of the iPhone 6 series may feel the need to change to a refurbished model because iOS 13 no longer supports it," Kuo wrote in a note to investors recently. Watch Video "Is this the Candidate to Hold First iPhone in Southeast Asia?" [Gambas: Video 20sec.] (Fyk / rns)
